#
[OBJECTS]
# type	x	y	extra_settings per object type
# type: 0 = Mario , 1 = Brick, 2 = Goomba, 3 = Koopas, 5 = platform, 6 = ParaGoomba, 7 = Ground, 8 = Question Block (arg3: 1 powerup), 9 = Venus, 10 = PowerUpItem, 11 = Pipe, 12 = CoinItem, 13 = ColorBlock, 14 = BigBush, 15 = Decoration, 16 = Koopa, 17 = woodblock, 18 = piranha, 51 = pit, 52 = spawnbox (obj type: 0 goomba, 1 paragoomba), 53 = hud, 54 = extra life mushroom, 55 = pipe portal, 56 = pswitch, 58 = itemrandom


# See OBJECT_TYPE constants in AssetIDs.h

#	x	y	width	height	size	sprite_begin sprite_middle sprite_end
